My Co-op at G3

During the summer of 2017 I worked as a Software Engineering Co-op for G3 Technologies, a defense contractor located around D.C.. G3 works primarily on RF products that are sold to the U.S. military for over-seas use. This was my first of three Co-ops that are part of my degree...
